news.title: How a hacking campaign targeted high-profile Gmail and WhatsApp users across the Middle East
news.summary: The phishing campaign targeted users on WhatsApp, including an Iranian-British activist, and stole the credentials of a Lebanese cabinet minister and at least one journalist.

news.title: X is down for the second time this week
news.summary: Elon Musk's X, formerly Twitter, is down for the second time this week. Nearly 80,000 reports have spiked on Down Detector since around 10 a.m. ET Friday morning.

news.title: Chinese EVs inch closer to the US as Canada slashes tariffs
news.summary: The country is dropping its import tax from 100% to just 6.1%, with an initial annual cap of 49,000 cars.

news.title: YouTube relaxes monetization guidelines for some controversial topics
news.summary: These controversial topics include self-harm, abortion, suicide, and domestic and sexual abuse.

news.title: Bluesky rolls out cashtags and LIVE badges amid a boost in app installs

news.title: Ads are coming soon to ChatGPT, starting with shopping links
news.summary: ChatGPT will soon start showing you sponsored products or services if they're related to your conversation. news.title: OpenAI releases a cheaper ChatGPT subscription
news.summary: OpenAI is expanding a low-cost subscription tier called ChatGPT Go to the US and the rest of the world. news.title: X is still having issues following an hour-long outage on Friday
news.summary: On Friday morning, X and Grok went offline for users around the world on both the websites and apps. Outage reports began spiking on DownDetector around 10:00AM ET, while Cisco's ThousandEyes outage map noted over 600 X servers around the world that were having problems. news.title: Canada is going to start importing Chinese EVs — will the US follow?
news.summary: Is the North American blockade on Chinese EVs softening? Today, Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney announced a deal with China to slash tariffs on electric vehicles in exchange for lowering duties on canola products.
